description.@en: You instill your godâ€™s might and fortitude in your allies.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, a number of allies equal to your [FB] who can see and hear you are immune to the Intimidate Skill and cannot be subjected to Stress or Fear.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your allies are also immune to Terror.

criticalFailure.@en: Your words fail, as you invoke the damnation of your own god. Not only that, your allies are instilled with cowardice. A number of allies equal to your [FB] suffer a -6 to their Peril Condition Track until the Duration is up.
